title: Moroccan Boy Trapped in Well for Four Days Dies
sub_head: Rescuers reached five-year-old Rayan Aourram after tunneling into the well in an effort that captured world-wide attention
body:
A young boy trapped for four days in a well in northern Morocco has died, according to the country’s royal palace, after a frantic rescue effort that captured world-wide attention.
Rescuers reached the five-year-old child, identified as Rayan Aourram, on Saturday night after excavating and tunneling into the well, but he did not survive. He was pulled out wrapped in a yellow blanket and taken by helicopter to a hospital before Morocco’s monarch confirmed his death.
